prime.gui.effects.ScrollEffect

Animates an IPositionable object from start position to its end position

Constructor

new(?duration : Int, ?delay : Int, ?easing : Easing, ?isReverted : Bool, ?startX : Float, ?startY : Float, ?endX : Float, ?endY : Float)

inherited from prime.gui.effects.Effect

inherited from prime.gui.effects.Effect

endX : Float

Explicit x value of the animation at the end.

endY : Float

Explicit y value of the animation at the end.

invalidated(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal2<Int, IInvalidatable>

inherited from prime.core.traits.Invalidatable

isReverted(default,accessor) : Bool

inherited from prime.gui.effects.Effect

startX : Float

Explicit start x value. If this value is not set, the effect will use the current x of the IPositionable.

startY : Float

Explicit start y value. If this value is not set, the effect will use the current y of the IPositionable.
